title: Menus & Layout
description: Manage application navigation, menu structure, and visual sections.
subheading: This section is the control panel for the entire application's navigation flow. Choose a subsection below to manage a specific part of the user experience.

presets.title: Menu Templates (Presets)
presets.description: Create and manage complete menu structures that can be applied to different Access Levels.

dialog.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the preset "{presetName}"?

groups.description: Organize side menu items into logical, collapsible sections.
